content:
This section provides the necessary download links for the mesh generation tools tailored specifically for Maya/Max and Blender users, enabling them to access the appropriate software for creating navigation meshes as outlined in the document.

Maya and Max :

https://sites.google.com/site/etcpandai/download/meshgen_v1.0_exec.zip?attredirects=0&d=1

Blender : (source also available in the Open Source section)

https://sites.google.com/site/etcpandai/download/BlenderMeshGen.zip?attredirects=0&d=1
